archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Branch Database [BRDB]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Horizon Branch database. Used by the Horizon application servers to store POS transactions and by many batch processes to post-process the transactions, e.g. for reconciliation, AP client file generation.
4 node Oracle RAC RDBMS with Oracle Dataguard shipping redo logs to a standby instance in the DR DC.
<https://poluk.sharepoint.com/sites/PostOfficeDocumentLibrary/Shared%20Documents/High%20Level%20Design%20(HLD)/HLD047%20DESAPPHLD0020%20Branch%20Database%20High%20Level%20Design.doc?d=w66f147f9af6e45349c55abd8a0e9993b>
